script_version_control.forced_update_reason: A critical security vulnerability has been patched. Please update immediately for your safety.
script_version_control.optional_update_message: A new version {latest_stable_version} is available with exciting new features and improvements! (You are on {current_version})

access_control.global_disable_message: The service is temporarily down for maintenance. Please check back later or contact support at support@example.com.
access_control.device_block_message: Your device ({device_id}) has been restricted from accessing this service. If you believe this is an error, please contact support at support@example.com with your Device ID.

announcement.title: System Update
announcement.message: 欢迎使用新版本！优化了位置识别算法并增加了自动重试机制。
